column4: I'd love a nice gnome-3 based distro, but ubuntu switched to unity, and it sucks.
opensuse and fedora, to my knowledge, are the only gnome 3 distros right now.
yes, arch is awsome, but it lacks some basic common sense niceties of apt, so I had to give it up after having to recursively list an entire directory to not have it nuke my configs...
